Description.Text: The Ritz-Carlton Santiago is a luxury 5-star hotel offering elegant accommodation in north-east Santiago. Highlights include a rooftop swimming pool, Jacuzzi, multiple restaurants, stunning views and good transport links. Las Condes is an upscale commercial and residential area known colloquially as Sanhattan. Nearby places of interest include Apoquindo Avenue, the Teatro Municipal de Las Condes and a golf course. El Golf metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Santiago destinations. The hotel occupies a contemporary mid-rise property with a glass-domed roof. Facilities include a rooftop indoor swimming pool, Jacuzzi, steam room, gym and sauna. A range of massages and spa treatments are available on request. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Deluxe rooms are 40sqm and decorated in a classic style with dark wood furniture. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe, air-conditioning and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub and separate walk-in shower. The Estro restaurant offers regional and international dishes in a sleek and sophisticated setting. The Arola restaurant offers Tapas cuisine in a vibrant atmosphere featuring a DJ and a terrace. Guests can enjoy live jazz music and a range of cocktails, fine wines, champagnes and cigars at the elegant bar. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
